issue.title: [C++] CudaDeviceManager::GetInstance is not thread-safe
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5304](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5304). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CudaDeviceManager::GetInstance is not thread-safe.
Segment fault will happen if multi-thread create it simultaneously.
